title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: FIFA’s Leader Often Flatters Trump. Now, He’s Awarding a Peace Prize.
items.description: Gianni Infantino, head of soccer’s governing body, has been ingratiating himself with the president to help ensure a successful 2026 World Cup.

items.title: On Pope Leo’s Visit to Lebanon and Turkey, A.I. Was a Frequent Concern
items.description: On his first trip as pontiff, Leo XIV predictably called for peace and unity. But he also addressed technology’s promise and pitfalls.
